title: Loops to learn by
creator_credit: Rex Tasker, Robert Verrall, Dorothy Courtois and National Film Board of Canada
brief_description: One of the most practical and productive of innovations in educational visual aids was the 8mm single-concept film loop contained in a cassette inserted into a projector simple enough for a young child to operate. This film tells how a series of such loops for people with learning disabilities were developed with the advice of psychologists, and shows situations in which they can be usefully employed.
